title: RENT STABILIZED--SWIMMING POOL --LUXURY LIVING -
posting_body: ['RENT STABILIZED--SWIMMING POOL --LUXURY LIVING -', 'Listing ID #: 212888', 'Price: $3,120', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Balcony', 'Dishwasher', 'High Ceilings', 'Marble Bath', 'Open View', 'Amazing corner unit convertible one bedroom with over sized windows makes a fantastic home for anyone looking to live downtown.', 'There are two walls of closets, a windowed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and a gracious bath with plenty of storage.', 'BUILDING as 24th h.', "Doorman with a number of amenities including a beautiful landscaped roof deck with breathtaking views, a full size indoor swimming pool, a fitness center, children's play room designed by Apple Seeds, a comfortable furnished solarium for use year round, bicycle storage, package room and club room with wi-fi.", 'History meets modern-day allure in FiDi, the mecca of finance, commerce and technology located on the tip of Manhattan.', 'Among sweeping vistas of the Brooklyn Bridge and New York Harbor, architecturally distinct buildings from yesteryear have been beautifully refurbished and are complemented by luxury residential high rises', 'CONTACT MARCO TO SCHEDULE A PRIVATE VIEWING MOBILE (917)353-3448 EMAIL', '<URL> Marco Bianchi Phone: (212) 402-7855 Mobile: 9173533448 Fax: (212) 402-7856 Email: <URL>', 'Marco Bianchi Phone: (212) 402-7855 Mobile: 9173533448 Fax: (212) 402-7856 Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group (212) 402-7855 9173533448 FAX (212) 402-7856 <URL>', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448', 'Marco Bianchi', 'Phone: 9173533448', 'Mobile: 9173533448', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448']
